text: innum, avarkalitam; "vanattiliruntu nirai irakki, piraku atanaik kontu ippumiyai - atu (kayntu) marittapin uyirppippavan yar?" Enru nir ketpirakil; "allah" enre ivarkal tittamakak kuruvarkal; (atarku nir)"al'hamtu lillah - pukalanaittum allahvukke uriyatu" enru kuruviraka eninum ivarkalil perumpalor arintunara mattarkal
